quote: It was so quiet, one of the killers would later say, you could almost hear the sound of ice rattling in cocktail shakers in the homes way down the canyon.
source: Oppening line if the book 'Helter Skelter'

quote: Helter Skelter she's comin' down fast

source: Written on the front door of the Tate-Polanski residence

quote: How does it feel to be one of the beautiful people?
source: The Beatles - Baby You're a Rich Man
